_meanings:
{@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a very sacred verse
repeated by every Brāhmaṇa at his
Saṃdhyā (morning and evening
devotions) and on other occasions
also. Great sins even are said to be
expiated by a pious repetition of
this verse, which is as follows:
--{#tatsaviturvareRyaM Bargo devasya DImahi Diyo yo na#}
{#pracodayAt#} <ls>Rv. 3. 62. 10.</ls>

A
hymn composed and recited in the
Gāyatrī metre.
